snippet.title: PSX Longplay [683] Midnight Run: Road Fighter 2 (EU)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: KAGE-008

Port from the Arcade game, it mixes the gameplay from the classic title with Initial D, since this game switches from a 2D environment to a 3D one. The European package removes the 'Road Fighter 2' subtitle, though it still appears in-game.

You only get to race on three tracks with any of the four playable vehicles; however, the max. speed and acceleration are the same for all of them, but you can choose between Normal and Tuned engine before starting the race. And there is no ending, it just throws back to the title screen after every race. This video covers all those three tracks, each one with a different car.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
